channel.title: Performance Tuning on Lee Brownhill's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Performance Tuning on Lee Brownhill's Blog

item.title: SQL Server Optimisation: Why Less Is More
item.description: One of the most valuable lessons I’ve learned in performance tuning is the importance of breaking queries tasks into smaller, more manageable sections. Who knew? The experts were right all along when they said, “If you’re confused by the query, SQL probably is too”.
